title: Simone Clarke, Musings of a Lonely Girl Abroad: Paris
description: Simone Clarke, Danielle's best friend from the steamy Glass Towers Trilogy is now the star of her own series; Simone Clarke, Musings of a Lonely Girl Abroad. Each novella length book stands alone, as we follow Simone while she travels around the world as an "A" List clothing stylist, LOOKING FOR LOVE, in this fun series. You will also get to hear more about your favorite characters and ones you hate from Glass Towers, as she globe trots and blogs about her antics in each exotic destination!! Each book is packed with humor, romance, scandal, self reflection and of course a little hanky-panky. First stop is the ultimate city of romance, Paris, France. Find out what adventures are ahead for the loveable Clarke.
author: Adler
